Sub: Letter of Job Confirmation after probation period.
Dear ,
Following completion of your probation period form to at Yuko Leather Goods Ltd. We have reviewed your performance and found the same to be satisfactory.
In view of the above, we are pleased to inform you that you have been confirmed to the position of at Yuko Leather Goods Ltd. will effective from date mentioned in new contract attached with this letter. Your basic salary has been revised to BDT per month, will effect from your confirmation date and other benefits will be entertain based on basic salary.
Your salary will be reviews every 12 months and will be increases based upon satisfactory performance in the position.
All other terms and conditions of your appointment will remain the same. Please signify your acceptance of these terms and conditions by signing the new agreement attached with this letter & return to Human Resource Dept. at an earliest convenient time.
In case you have any queries, do not hesitate to reach our Human Resource Officer / Department Supervisor. Yuko Leather Goods Ltd.
Congratulates! This is your confirmation letter and wishes you well in your position.
Sincerely,
Attached Contract Documents:
Job Responsibility & Timing
Salary
Advantages
Terms & Condition
